name: Vegetable Fried Rice
ingredients: Rice, mixed vegetables, soy sauce, egg
steps: Stir fry cooked rice with vegetables, scrambled egg and soy sauce.

name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
ingredients: Chicken, lettuce, Caesar dressing, tortilla wrap
steps: Mix cooked chicken with dressing, add lettuce, wrap tightly.

name: Yogurt Parfait
steps: Layer yogurt, berries and granola in a jar and drizzle honey on top.

name: Avocado Toast
ingredients: Bread, avocado, lemon juice, salt, pepper
steps: Toast bread, mash avocado with seasoning and spread on top.

name: Veggie Noodles
ingredients: Noodles, bell peppers, carrots, soy sauce
steps: Stir fry vegetables, add cooked noodles and soy sauce.

name: Rice & Beans
steps: Cook rice and beans separately, then mix and season.

name: Tuna Sandwich
steps: Mix tuna with mayo, spread on bread and add lettuce.

name: Tomato Basil Pasta
steps: Cook pasta, simmer sauce with garlic and basil, then combine.

name: Vegetable Omelette
steps: Whisk eggs, add chopped vegetables and cheese, cook in pan.

name: Stir Fry Vegetables
steps: Stir fry vegetables in a hot pan and finish with soy sauce.

name: Oatmeal Bowl
steps:
Cook oats with milk until soft and creamy.

,Top with fresh fruit and nuts before serving

name: Lemon Garlic Shrimp
steps:
Melt butter and add garlic

,Cook shrimp until pink

,Squeeze lemon and season.
